column.name: Added to EDS profile and communicated

table.name: v_last_realign_date
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp` AS `ppp`,max(`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`entrydate`) AS `md` from `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` group by `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp`

table.name: v_note_summaries
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`id` AS `note_id`,`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`note_text` AS `note_text`,`dppa_scheduler`.`note_reasons`.`note_reason_name` AS `note_reason_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`note_reason_types`.`note_reason_type_name` AS `note_reason_type_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`created_date` AS `created_date`,`dppa_scheduler`.`users`.`username` AS `created_by_username`,`dppa_scheduler`.`users`.`first_name` AS `created_by_first_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`users`.`last_name` AS `created_by_last_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`statuses`.`status_name` AS `status_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`prodcode` AS `s_prodcode`,`dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`product_name` AS `s_product_name`,`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`s_note_date` AS `s_note_date`,if((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`s_note_date` is not null),if((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`s_product_id` is not null),'Product Date','Date'),if((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`s_product_id` is not null),'Product','Build')) AS `note_for` from (((((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes` left join `dppa_scheduler`.`note_reasons` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`note_reason_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`note_reasons`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`created_by_user_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`users`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`statuses` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`status_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`statuses`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`products` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes`.`s_product_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`note_reason_types` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`note_reasons`.`note_reason_type_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`note_reason_types`.`id`)))

AS `file_folder_spaces_tildes`,`dmr`.`file_exceeds_2gb_limit` AS `file_exceeds_2gb_limit`,`acb`.`Build Status` AS `cur_build_stat`,`acb`.`Current Job` AS `cur_build_job` from (((((((((((((((((((((`dppa_scheduler`.`products` `p` left join `dppa_scheduler`.`dbp_onboarding` `d` on((`d`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`dbp_metadata_review` `dmr` on((`dmr`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`teams` `t` on((`t`.`id` = `p`.`team_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`content_sources` `cs` on((`cs`.`id` = `p`.`content_source_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`availability_check_types` `act` on((`act`.`id` = `p`.`availability_check_type_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`ip_access_models` `iam` on((`iam`.`id` = `d`.`ip_access_model_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`product_schema` `ps` on((`ps`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`statuses` `h` on((`h`.`id` = `p`.`status_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`priorities` `pr` on((`pr`.`id` = `p`.`priority_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`data_schemas` `ds` on((`ds`.`id` = `ps`.`schema_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` `u1` on((`u1`.`id` = `p`.`dppa_owner_user_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` `u2` on((`u2`.`id` = `p`.`pm_owner_user_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` `u3` on((`u3`.`id` = `p`.`pcm_owner_user_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`database_types` `dt` on((`dt`.`id` = `p`.`database_type_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`build_types` `bt` on((`bt`.`id` = `p`.`build_type_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`workflow_systems` `ws` on((`ws`.`id` = `p`.`workflow_system_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`product_specialhandling` `psh` on((`psh`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_templates` `st` on((`st`.`product_id` = `p`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies` `bf` on((`bf`.`id` = `st`.`build_frequency_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`departments` `de` on((`de`.`id` = `st`.`source_department_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`appworx_current_builds` `acb` on((`p`.`prodcode` = convert(`acb`.`Product Code` using utf8)))) where (`p`.`status_id` = 1)

table.name: v_realign_history
table.viewSql: select `r`.`entrydate` AS `entrydate`,(case when isnull(`v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp`) then `r`.`startdate` else '' end) AS `startdate`,`v_realign_history_leadtime_date`.`Build After Last Delivery` AS `Build After Last Delivery`,`r`.`ppp` AS `Prod Code`,`v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp` AS `ppp`,(case when (`r`.`action` = 'swap') then 'Rebuild' when (`r`.`action` = 'live') then 'Update' else `r`.`action` end) AS `Build Mode`,(case when (`r`.`sender` = 'Appworx') then 'V8' when (`r`.`sender` like '%@%') then 'autosys' when (`r`.`sender` = 'legacy') then 'autosys' else `r`.`sender` end) AS `Sender`,`r`.`recordcount` AS `recordcount`,(select `phr`.`recordcount` from `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` `phr` where (`phr`.`ppp` = `r`.`ppp`) order by `r`.`entrydate` desc limit 1) AS `previous_record_count`,(case when (`r`.`sender` in ('v9-1606','v9-1506','v9-1995')) then 'Yes' else 'No' end) AS `SLS` from (((`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` `r` join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_last_realign_date` `a` on(((`a`.`ppp` = `r`.`ppp`) and (`a`.`md` = `r`.`entrydate`)))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_realign_start_date_legacy` on((`r`.`ppp` = `v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_realign_history_leadtime_date` on((`r`.`ppp` = convert(`v_realign_history_leadtime_date`.`ppp` using utf8))))

table.name: v_realign_history_leadtime_date
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign_lt`.`ppp` AS `ppp`,cast(`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign_lt`.`min(r.entrydate)` as datetime) AS `Build After Last Delivery` from `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign_lt`

table.name: v_realign_history_old
table.viewSql: select `r`.`entrydate` AS `entrydate`,(case when isnull(`v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp`) then `r`.`startdate` else '' end) AS `startdate`,`v_realign_history_leadtime_date`.`Build After Last Delivery` AS `Build After Last Delivery`,`r`.`ppp` AS `Prod Code`,`v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp` AS `ppp`,(case when (`r`.`action` = 'swap') then 'Rebuild' when (`r`.`action` = 'live') then 'Update' else `r`.`action` end) AS `Build Mode`,(case when (`r`.`sender` = 'Appworx') then 'V8' when (`r`.`sender` like '%@%') then 'autosys' when (`r`.`sender` = 'legacy') then 'autosys' else `r`.`sender` end) AS `Sender`,`r`.`recordcount` AS `recordcount`,(case when (`r`.`sender` in ('v9-1606','v9-1506','v9-1995')) then 'Yes' else 'No' end) AS `SLS` from (((`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` `r` join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_last_realign_date` `a` on(((`a`.`ppp` = `r`.`ppp`) and (`a`.`md` = `r`.`entrydate`)))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_realign_start_date_legacy` on((`r`.`ppp` = `v_realign_start_date_legacy`.`ppp`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_realign_history_leadtime_date` on((`r`.`ppp` = convert(`v_realign_history_leadtime_date`.`ppp` using utf8))))

table.name: v_realign_start_date_legacy
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp` AS `ppp` from `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` where ((`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`startdate` <> '~') and (`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`startdate` <> '')) group by `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp` having (count(distinct `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`startdate`) <> count(`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`startdate`))

on((`dppa_scheduler`.`scheduled_builds`.`s_build_frequency_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`database_types` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`scheduled_builds`.`s_database_type_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`database_types`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` `users_1` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`scheduled_builds`.`s_dppa_owner_user_id` = `users_1`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`users` `users_2` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`scheduled_builds`.`s_pcm_owner_user_id` = `users_2`.`id`)))

table.name: v_scheduled_builds_failure_counts
table.viewSql: select `dt`.`database_type_name` AS `database_type_name`,`nr`.`note_reason_name` AS `note_reason_name`,count(0) AS `CountOfFailure` from (((((`dppa_scheduler`.`notes` `n` left join `dppa_scheduler`.`notes_scheduled_builds` `nsb` on((`n`.`id` = `nsb`.`note_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`scheduled_builds` `sb` on((`sb`.`id` = `nsb`.`scheduled_build_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`products` `p` on((`p`.`id` = `sb`.`product_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`note_reasons` `nr` on((`n`.`note_reason_id` = `nr`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`database_types` `dt` on((`dt`.`id` = `p`.`database_type_id`))) where ((`sb`.`scheduled_build_start_date` >= (curdate() - interval 7 day)) and (`sb`.`scheduled_build_start_date` < (curdate() + interval 1 day))) group by `dt`.`database_type_name`,`nr`.`note_reason_name` order by `CountOfFailure` desc

table.name: v_second_to_last_realign_date
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp` AS `ppp`,min(`dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`entrydate`) AS `md` from `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign` group by `dppa_scheduler`.`phr_realign`.`ppp`

table.name: v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,max(`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`delivery_date`) AS `delivery_date_most_recent` from `dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history` where isnull(`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`bogus_delivery_reason_id`) group by `dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`product_id`

table.name: v_sub_delivery_date_02_second_most_recent
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,max(`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`delivery_date`) AS `delivery_date_second_most_recent` from (`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history` join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`product_id` = `v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`product_id`))) where (isnull(`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`bogus_delivery_reason_id`) and (`dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`delivery_date` < `v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`delivery_date_most_recent`)) group by `dppa_scheduler`.`archive_delivery_date_history`.`product_id`

table.name: v_sub_delivery_date_03_days_between
table.viewSql: select `v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,`v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`delivery_date_most_recent` AS `delivery_date_most_recent`,`v_sub_delivery_date_02_second_most_recent`.`delivery_date_second_most_recent` AS `delivery_date_second_most_recent`,(to_days(`v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`delivery_date_most_recent`) - to_days(`v_sub_delivery_date_02_second_most_recent`.`delivery_date_second_most_recent`)) AS `actual_days_between_deliveries` from (`dppa_scheduler`.`v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent` left join `dppa_scheduler`.`v_sub_delivery_date_02_second_most_recent` on((`v_sub_delivery_date_01_most_recent`.`product_id` = `v_sub_delivery_date_02_second_most_recent`.`product_id`)))

table.name: v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01
table.viewSql: select `dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`id` AS `product_id`,`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name` AS `build_frequency_name`,count(`dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_template_dates`.`schedule_template_date`) AS `schedule_template_date_count`,if((`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name` in ('Daily','Weekly')),`dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_template_dates`.`frequency_recurrence`,1) AS `frequency_recurrence_fix`,if((`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name` = 'Daily'),365,if((`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name` = 'Weekly'),52.1429,if((`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name` = 'Static'),0,1))) AS `mapped_frequency_number` from (((`dppa_scheduler`.`products` left join `dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_templates` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_templates`.`product_id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_templates`.`build_frequency_id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`id`))) left join `dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_template_dates` on((`dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_templates`.`id` = `dppa_scheduler`.`schedule_template_dates`.`schedule_template_id`))) group by `dppa_scheduler`.`products`.`id`,`dppa_scheduler`.`build_frequencies`.`build_frequency_name`

table.name: v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_02
table.viewSql: select `v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`build_frequency_name` AS `build_frequency_name`,`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`schedule_template_date_count` AS `schedule_template_date_count`,`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`frequency_recurrence_fix` AS `frequency_recurrence_fix`,`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`mapped_frequency_number` AS `mapped_frequency_number`,if(((`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`build_frequency_name` is not null) and (`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`build_frequency_name` <> 'Static')),round(((365 / (`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`schedule_template_date_count` * `v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`mapped_frequency_number`)) / `v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`.`frequency_recurrence_fix`),0),NULL) AS `estimated_days_between_builds` from `dppa_scheduler`.`v_sub_estimated_days_between_deliveries_01`
